seed_event: Major tech company announces layoffs of 10,000 employees
context: Tech downturn, rising interest rates, over-hiring during pandemic

outcome_chain.event: Stock price drops 15% in initial trading
CEO announces restructuring plan
Company returns to profitability
Announces modest hiring for AI roles

seed_event: Central bank raises interest rates by 75 basis points
context: Inflation at 8.2%, highest in 40 years, unemployment at 3.7%

outcome_chain.event: Mortgage rates surge to 7% for 30-year fixed
Housing market sees 20% decline in sales volume
Inflation shows signs of cooling to 6.5%
Recession fears ease as economy stabilizes

seed_event: Country announces universal basic income pilot program
context: Post-pandemic economic recovery, 12% unemployment, $500/month to 5000 citizens

outcome_chain.event: Initial study shows 15% reduction in poverty rate
Critics raise concerns about inflation in local markets
Government votes to expand program to 50,000 citizens
Long-term study reveals mixed employment effects

seed_event: Major social media platform banned in country of 200M users
context: Government cites national security, platform refuses data localization

outcome_chain.event: VPN downloads surge 300% as users seek workarounds
Platform loses $2B in market cap, announces job cuts
Competing local platform gains 50M users
Platform reaches data-sharing compromise with government

seed_event: Breakthrough AI model achieves human-level performance on coding
context: Model scores 85% on HumanEval benchmark, open-sourced by research lab

outcome_chain.event: 10,000+ GitHub repos integrate model within weeks
Major tech companies announce AI-assisted development tools
Developer survey shows 70% using AI coding assistants daily
Industry reports 40% productivity gains in software development

seed_event: Climate summit results in binding emissions reduction treaty
context: 195 countries agree to 50% reduction by 2030, legally binding

outcome_chain.event: EU announces carbon border tax on high-emission imports
Major oil companies commit to net-zero by 2040
Renewable energy investment reaches $500B annually
Global emissions show first sustained decline since 1990

seed_event: Major cryptocurrency exchange collapses, $8B in user funds frozen
context: CEO arrested for fraud, regulatory oversight lacking, 2M affected users

outcome_chain.event: Bitcoin drops 25%, broader crypto market loses $200B
Regulators announce emergency hearings on crypto oversight
Congress passes strict cryptocurrency regulation bill
Users recover 30% of funds through bankruptcy proceedings

seed_event: Pandemic vaccine receives emergency approval for widespread use
context: Phase 3 trials show 95% efficacy, first vaccine approved in Western countries

outcome_chain.event: Healthcare workers begin receiving first doses
Vaccination sites open in all 50 states
50% of population receives at least one dose
Life expectancy shows first increase since pandemic began

seed_event: Major company announces full transition to remote work permanently
context: 5,000 employee tech company, closes 3 offices, cites productivity gains

outcome_chain.event: Real estate holdings sold for $450M
Employee retention improves by 30%
100+ companies in same industry follow suit
Urban office vacancy rates reach 25% in major cities

seed_event: Trade agreement signed between two major economic powers
context: Ends 18-month trade war, reduces tariffs on $200B in goods

outcome_chain.event: Stock markets surge 5% on optimism
Agricultural exports increase 40% year-over-year
Supply chain disruptions ease as manufacturing ramps up
Trade balance shows largest improvement in a decade
